text:
RadPad | Los Angeles, CA (Culver City) | full-time onsite

RadPad is reimagining what it means to rent. From going through the process of finding the perfect apartment to paying rent, RadPad is focused on creating experiences that make renting easier!

We're looking for Senior Rails, iOS, and QA Engineers. Best way to apply is to PM me directly. kin[at]onradpad.com

You can see more about our open positions here: https://www.onradpad.com/jobs
